forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun bathes Downtown San Francisco in a soft, golden light, the day feels pleasantly warm, even as subtle shifts in temperature bring a refreshing coolness. From your vantage point, the Golden Gate Bridge stands stoically against a backdrop of vibrant blue skies and scattered clouds, with wisps of fog hinting at a marine layer that lingers just off the coast. The west-southwest winds carry a gentle breeze, whispering sweet nothings to the bustling streets below—a reminder that, while sunshine reigns today, hints of the familiar San Francisco chill might return as evening approaches.

As the sky begins to dim, expect the chill to deepen, allowing the evening's clouds to cast a cozy veil over the city. The temperature will dip to around fifty, so you'll want to don a light jacket or a cozy sweater if you plan to wander into the night. With the clear yet dynamic conditions, this is a splendid opportunity to explore one of the city's quieter nooks, perhaps enjoy a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or find a cozy café whose warm ambiance invites you to linger over a cup of something comforting. Today is the kind of day that embraces the spirit of discovery, beckoning you to enjoy the little moments while basking in the beauty that is uniquely San Francisco.
